job.title: Software Engineer Intern
job.description:
Internship at a blockchain startup with unrivaled experience and a stellar reputation. 


Koinos Group is a company established by the core development team behind the Steem blockchain who has leveraged their decades of combined experience to build a brand new blockchain with no fees, and no barriers to entry; Koinos. With incredible multi-language support, Koinos will be just as accessible to developers as it is to end-users making smart contracts more accessible than ever. Koinos will empower developers to build free-to-use decentralized applications and even release their own customized blockchains using the very same programming languages they already know and love, like TypeScript!


We have already released a prototype of our technology and are progressing rapidly toward the release of our mainnet at which point we expect massive growth. 


We are looking for teachable, aspiring engineers who are passionate about blockchain technology, smart contracts, decentralization, and cryptocurrencies.


If you’re looking to break into this exciting (and sometimes crazy) industry, then this is the perfect position for you!
